metadata.title: CVE-2021-23996 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: By utilizing 3D CSS in conjunction with Javascript, content could have been rendered outside the webpage's viewport, resulting in a spoofing attack that could have been used for phishing or other attacks on a user. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 88.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '88.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
